testCase.name: AuthService should send an auth request to the backend
RegisterComponent should render the component
RegisterComponent should create
RegisterComponent should enable register button when all fields are correctly set
ToastComponent should render the component
LandingPageComponent should create
ToastService should push a toast to the toasts array
ToastService should remove a toast from array
LoginGuard should be created
LoginComponent should create
LoginComponent should display login button
LoginComponent should return valid login form is username is set
LoginComponent should return invalid login form if username is empty
LoginComponent should return valid login form if password is set
LoginComponent should return invalid login form if password is not set
LoginComponent should enable login button when username and password is set
LoginComponent should not enable login button when only username is set
AuthGuard should be created
AppComponent should render the app
AppComponent should display login page

HeaderComponent should navigate to the correct routes
HeaderComponent should log the user out
HeaderComponent should change the collapsed property of the navbar
StorageService should be created
StorageService should save auth response to session storage
StorageService should retrieve authentication when present
